title: Frozen Tissue
subtitle: Frozen Tissue Proteomics Analysis
description: Deliver highest quality proteomics data from fresh-frozen tissue samples. Achieve deep proteome coverage ideal for tissue-specific biology, disease pathology, and systems biology research.

features.title: Superior Data Quality
features.description: Leverage excellent protein preservation in frozen tissue to provide maximum depth and accuracy in proteomics analysis. Post-translational modifications (PTMs) are also effectively preserved.

features.title: Diverse Tissue Types
features.description: Consistent high-quality results from all tissue types including brain, liver, kidney, heart, and muscle. Tissue-specific protocols ensure optimized protein extraction.

features.title: Quantitative Comparative Analysis
features.description: Normal vs. disease tissue, pre-/post-treatment comparisons, tissue heterogeneity studies. Accurately compare multiple samples simultaneously with TMT multiplexing.
